name: christmas in july crochet stocking
sizes_available: 19" from folded cuff to toe; 11" circumference
notes:

this listing is for the individual stocking as shown.

**let's explore custom holiday stockings together**
[*join the course now*][3]

**video tutorial**
[https://youtu.be/vticjat11s8][4]

**crochet hook:**
[size g (4mm) hook][5]

**notations:**
[removable stitch marker][6]
[yarn needle to weave in ends][7]
[scissors][8]
[leather strip][9] (optional)
[leather hole punch][10] (optional)

**yarn:**
[wecrochet city tweed dk weight][11]
55% merino wool, 25% superfine alpaca,
20% donegal tweed, 123 yds/50g

**yardage:**
colorways:
snowbank (2 balls, 180 yds)
blue blood (1 ball, 90 yds)
toad (2 balls, 180 yds)
total yardage is approx. 450yds

**abbreviations:**
ch - chain
rs - right side
sc - single crochet
sc2tog - single crochet two together
sl st - slip stitch
st(s) - stitch(es)
ssc - split single crochet
ws - wrong side
yo- yarn over

**gauge:**
17 sts x 21 rows = 4x4 inches in ssc

**measurements:**
19" from folded cuff to toe; 11" circumference.

**skill level:**
intermediate
